Package edu.monash.fit2099.game.grounds

Class MagicalFountain

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
edu.monash.fit2099.game.grounds.MagicalFountain
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HealthFountain, PowerFountain
public abstract class MagicalFountain
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
MagicalFountain class is an abstract class that houses the basic functionalities of Fountain objects in the game. It tells the game how to store the water, what you can do with the water and how to refill itself but not what water it can store.
See Also:
edu.monash.fit2099.game.grounds

      public void tick​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
